message: It's not like we did anything wrong, so why do I feel so guilty?
I fix my clothes and head for the bar in the den.
After rinsing my mouth out in the sink, I plop down on the couch.
I can hear the sound of the shower downstairs.
How did this even happen, anyway...
I remember some misunderstanding... that ended with him kissing me...
He said... he thought I was after him or something crazy like that... Is that still how he sees me?
I've never looked at him that way at all...
What's wrong with him? Is he just extremely self-conscious or something?
No... I get the feeling it's more complicated than that...
...Wait. Do I really have time to be worrying about this stuff?
While I'm lost in my thoughts, Noiz returns to the second floor.
I get up and walk past him. I can smell the shampoo in his still-wet hair; it makes my heart skip a beat.
...I really need to cool my head.
I hurry downstairs to the bathroom.
